name: Jeronimo
description:
The Jeronimo gang is back in business and wants to do the heist of their lives. For that, they must steal & carry all the museums's loot to their van without being caught. Are you up to the challenge?

Gameplay

The victory condition of this couch co-op game is to reach the vault of the Museum of Museums and escape with all the loot. The players need to gather equipment that is hidden throughout the city in puzzles of increasing difficulty. After gathering the equipment the players need to figure out the best way to reach the vault and escape the museum without being detected.

Instalation

 Extract the Zip and then Run the Jeronimo.exe 

Requirements 

Requires at least one controller to be played properly. 

Controls

Keyboard Movement - WASD Interact - E Jump/Walk as BigPlayer - Space Open Menu - Esc 

Controller Movement - Left Stick Interact - Left Button (on a PS4 would be the square) Jump/Walk as BigPlayer - Down Button (on a PS4 would be the X) Open Menu - Select 

Note: Player 1 can also have the same control scheme as long as there is another controller.
